Name: GraviFire
About the game: The green fire has been abducted by evil aliens, who force him to solve puzzles for tests. Need to pass all the tests to be able to return the green fire back to his home. You have to brainstorm over 50 levels. Gravity, movement, killing lasers... What else the aliens have prepared? Gravity control 50 mind-bending levels Many different mechanics Bright pixel graphics
